name: Pesticide Action Network Italy
goal:
Pesticide Action Network Italy (PAN-Italy) was founded in 2013.

Our activities include: lobbying at regional and national level in Italy, but also on European level, gathering information on pesticide problems and issues, regulations and alternatives, holding workshops and conferences and facilitating dialogue for change between government, private sector, civil society Stakeholders, and victims of pesticides.

PAN Italy strives for better agricultural practise and management, which is the best way to ensure sustainability and high food quality.

PAN Italy has partnerships on local, regional, national, and european level with other organisations, with the same objectives.

PAN Italy is Member of PAN Europe Board (since May 2016)
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
